com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.config

Interface DriverConfig


  • public interface DriverConfig
    The configuration of the driver.

    It is composed of options, that are organized into profiles. There is a default profile that is always present, and additional, named profiles, that can override part of the options. Profiles can be used to categorize queries that use the same parameters (for example, an "analytics" profile vs. a "transactional" profile).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default DriverExecutionProfile getDefaultProfile()
      Alias to get the default profile, which is stored under the name DriverExecutionProfile.DEFAULT_NAME and always present.
      DriverExecutionProfile getProfile(String profileName) 
      Map<String,? extends DriverExecutionProfile> getProfiles()
      Returns an immutable view of all named profiles (including the default profile).

        Alias to get the default profile, which is stored under the name DriverExecutionProfile.DEFAULT_NAME and always present.

                                           String profileName)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no profile with this name.

      • getProfiles

        @NonNull
Map<String,? extends DriverExecutionProfile> getProfiles()
        Returns an immutable view of all named profiles (including the default profile).
